turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Ciurea rail disaster.
turn.1: What happened at the Ciurea rail disaster?
turn.2: Receiving signals sent by the engineers of the stricken locomotives, Ciurea railway station employees activated a switch so that the train to enter line 2 and avoid collision with wagons filled with tar that were stopped on line 1.
turn.3: What else happened at the disaster?
turn.4: Because of the high speed and sharp angle, however, only the locomotive and one wagon managed to enter line 2; all but two of the other cars derailed.
turn.5: What else is known about the disaster?
turn.6: It seems that at least one of the wagons collided with some fuel tanks, triggering an explosion and a huge fire.
turn.8: The train burned in less than two hours.
turn.9: Any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: Yvonne Blondel was rescued by two soldiers of the French military mission, who pulled her out of the train wreck exactly when her clothes were ablaze.
turn.12: Other passengers died in the fire or were killed by the impact of the derailment.
